Therefore, the present work has as a main goal the production of valuable hydrocarbons by CO 2 hydrogenatio n. The composite catalysts with M/ In2O3 (where M is 1% of Ga, Nb, La, or Mg) and HZSM -5 zeolite were tested at 340 ¬∞C, 30 bar, 9,0 L h-1 gcat-1, and H2/CO 2 ratio of 3.
